title: Number of Pokémon GO daily users in the U.S. 2016
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of users in millions for 4 number of Months.
The maximum Number of users in millions 45.0 is found at Month July 19 and the minimum is found at July 12 where Month is 21.0.
The minimum Month July 12 has got 2.14 times less Number of users in millions than the maximum Month July 19.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of users in millions for 4 number of Months.
The Number of users in millions is highest at Month July 19 and lowest at Month July 12.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of users in millions for 4 number of Months.
The maximum Number of users in millions 45.0 is found at Month July 19 and the minimum is found at July 12 where Month is 21.0.
The minimum Month July 12 has got 2.14 times less Number of users in millions than the maximum Month July 19.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of users in millions in the y axis.
The Number of users in millions is appeared to be the highest at Month July 19 and lowest at Month July 12.
The second highest Number of users in millions is appeared to be the Month August 16.
The highest Month July 19 has 24.0 more Number of users in millions than the lowest Month July 12.
Number of users in millions at Month July 19 is 45.0 , second place is August 16 at 30.0, and thirdly is July 14 at 25.0.
The Number of users in millions has declined over the past 4 Months.
Considered together, the average Number of users in millions in all 4 Months is roughly 30.25.
The Number of users in millions is 121.0 if we add up values of all Months.
